document_data.caption: ''A member of the Order of the Sapphire Crescent in [[Arrabar]].''
document_data.name: Order of the Sapphire Crescent
document_data.orgname: the Order of the Sapphire Crescent
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of the Sapphire Crescent''' was a mercenary company, part of the [[Church of Waukeen]] that operated out of the [[Temple of Waukeen (Arrabar)|Temple of Waukeen]] in the city of [[Arrabar]].<ref>
